page.title: 09LAND USE
page.content: The land in our area is used for many different things.It is used mostly for army camps and housing. There are also a few shops like news- agents and supermarkets.There are also some public places around,such as pubs ,toilets,carparks and centres. The housing in this area is rather expensive because of these reasons. 1.because Liphook is on the route to London along the A3. 2.because it is not far to the coast and it is nearly all motorway to places like Southsea. 3.because Liphook is near to London,in the comuter belt. The land will later be used for a bypass to go from Liphook to Peters- field.It will make travelling quicker and there won't be so many long delays as there is at the moment.
